announce.description: All students with missing marks are requested to fill out there marks issues before the end of the semester
All form 4 students are urged to to read towards the upcoming KCSE exams. The library will be open everyday for them.
The third term will be startin on 2nd september 2023 and ending on 10 November 2023 due to the final year exams.
All students with missing marks are requested to fill out there marks issues before the end of the semester
